commit.message:
8322987

  remove obsolete and ever-problemlisted TestGCLocker* tests.

It tries to verify JNI by filling the heap, causing GCs, but always OOME'ing because the parameters to tune this behavior are too hard to get right for every case.

Functionality is already tested with other tests like gc/TestJNICriticalStressTest, gc/cslocker/TestCSLocker, vmTestbase/gc/lock/*, other tests that incidentally use JNI and collector specific JNI tests.

Given all this I think removing these tests is just fine.
